EmailTemplate.description: Email PC Team to Review / Modify Project Request Upon Submission
EmailTemplate.name: Email PC Team to Review Project Request
EmailTemplate.subject: New Project Request Pending Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
PC Team:
The following project request requires your review and approval prior to its project creation. Please click on the link below to proceed.
https://na63.salesforce.com/{!Project_Request__c.Id}
Thank you, System Administrator
